channel.title: Posts on John's Machine Learning and Deep Learning Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on John's Machine Learning and Deep Learning Blog

item.title: Roadmap
item.description: What exactly is the value prop of this blog? Well I like to think that I have some interesting things going on in my life: Machine learning, deep learning, linear algebra, statistics. I am a student in deep learning, and am lucky enough to be exposed daily to the inspirational and amazing work being conducted in the U of T ML group, at Vector Institute. In particular, I want to talk about the awesome papers and concepts I learn about in CSC2547 and CSC2541 My research: to appear in ACL 2020 (fingers crossed!

item.title: How to make a Hugo Subsite
item.description: You may have noticed that this blog exists under my main Github personal website. How did I get it to work? Github exposes your entire vitual directory by default. (This is why you can just put raw assets in the repo, and they will be served when queried directly) So, I just made Hugo build the entire blog subsite to a folder in my main repo! In short:
